officialTitle: Living With Statins - The Impact of Cholesterol Lowering Drugs on Health, Lifestyle and Well-being
inclusionCriteria:
* Elevated blood-cholesterol
* Must be MALE
* Must have minimum age of 40 Years
* Must have maximum age of 70 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Cholesterol-lowering drugs
* Diabetes Mellitus
* Cardiovascular disease such as arrythmia, ischaemic heart disease.
* Musculoskeletal disorders preventing the subject to perform physical training
* Mental disorders preventing the subject to understand the project description.
